text: Cervoni can refer to: * Jean-Baptiste Cervoni (1765 – 1809) a general officer in the French army during the French Revolutionary Wars * Isabella Cervoni 1575–1600) was an Italian poet of the Counter-Reformation period * Vincent Cervoni Schopenhauer (1991-) better known by the in-game name Happy, French Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) player
title: Cervoni
